section.title: Real Results from
section.description: See how Sawtic AI is transforming home service businesses across the Emirates

testimonials.name: Ahmed Al-Mansoori
testimonials.testimonial: Sawtic AI doubled our weekly cleaning contracts! We went from 80 to 160 regular clients in just 3 months. Never miss a call again!

testimonials.name: Fatima Al-Zahra
testimonials.testimonial: Our winter garden bookings increased 300%! AI handles seasonal demand perfectly - we're fully booked October through March.

testimonials.name: Omar Hassan
testimonials.testimonial: Emergency calls are our bread and butter now. AI captures every after-hours plumbing and AC emergency - ROI was immediate!

testimonials.name: Sarah Mitchell
testimonials.testimonial: Instant painting quotes revolutionized our business! Customers get accurate estimates immediately - we close 70% more deals.

testimonials.name: Mohammed Al-Rashid
testimonials.testimonial: Multi-service coordination is amazing. AI books cleaning after our painting jobs automatically. Customers love the seamless experience!
